entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Sussex
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:44 AM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -13.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sussex Four Corners 06:00 AM AST Thursday 02 March 2023
Temperature: -13.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -14.3°C
Wind: N 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this morning. Periods of snow beginning this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 19 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to periods of light snow after midnight. Amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 02 March 2023
